```{r}
library(ade4) #for the mantel test
```

```{r}
data_for_stan <- 
  list(
       n_obs  =3, 
       G = c(0.91,0.82,1.42),
       X = c(1,1,sqrt(2)),
       Z = rbind(c(-1,0,1,0,0,0),
              c(0,-1,0,0,0,1),
              c(0,0,1/sqrt(2),-1/sqrt(2), -1/sqrt(2),1/sqrt(2))),
      sample_prior = 0)
```

```{r}
library(cmdstanr)
initial_file <- file.path(here::here("stan", "initial_stan_model.stan"))
initial_model <- cmdstan_model(initial_file)

initial_fit <- initial_model$sample(
  data = data_for_stan,
  seed = 37733,
  chains = 4,
  parallel_chains = 4
)

print(initial_fit, max_rows = 24)
```

## Cholesky and non-centered form

```{r}
library(cmdstanr)
initial_file <- file.path(here::here("stan", "cholesky_initial_model.stan"))
initial_model <- cmdstan_model(initial_file)

initial_fit <- initial_model$sample(
  data = data_for_stan,
  seed = 37733,
  chains = 4,
  parallel_chains = 4
)

print(initial_fit, max_rows = 42)
```
